content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10562,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"compensation.png\",\"name\":\"compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":89},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Lithuania, your salary should be paid to you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"twice a month \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"unless you request your salary to be paid once a month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first (advance) payment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is equal to 30% of salary net pay and will be paid on the 20-25-the day of the month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rest \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"will be paid on the 5-10th of the following month. In case the mentioned days are not working days, the salary will be paid on the next working day after the corresponding calendar day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that during the first month of employment, newcomers will not receive an advance payment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At your request, the salary may be paid once - on the 5-10th of the following month to your nominated bank account. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If case you would like to change your bank account number for salary payments (or you’re opening a Lithuanian bank account), please send a filled-in payment request form on\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/lithuania/all-cities/compensations-and-benefits/compensation.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/lithuania/all-cities/compensations-and-benefits/compensation.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(attached below) to the following email \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Make sure that you fill in all required fields in the request (name and surname, request date, date from which you’d like to apply the changes, new bank account number, bank name, SWIFT code, and signature).
